name: ai-sdk-provider-claude-code
description: AI SDK provider for Claude via Claude Code CLI (use Pro/Max subscription)
author: Ben Vargas

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npx tsx examples/integration-test.ts
scripts.example:basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/basic-usage.ts
scripts.example:streaming: npm run build && npx tsx examples/streaming.ts
scripts.example:conversation: npm run build && npx tsx examples/conversation-history.ts
scripts.example:config: npm run build && npx tsx examples/custom-config.ts
scripts.example:object:basic: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-basic.ts
scripts.example:object:nested: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-nested.ts
scripts.example:object:constraints: npm run build && npx tsx examples/generate-object-constraints.ts
scripts.example:tools: npm run build && npx tsx examples/tool-management.ts
scripts.example:timeout: npm run build && npx tsx examples/long-running-tasks.ts
scripts.example:all: npm run build && npm run example:basic && npm run example:streaming && npm run example:conversation && npm run example:config && npm run example:object:basic && npm run example:object:nested && npm run example:object:constraints && npm run example:tools && npm run example:timeout
